text: City Convent Higher Secondary School, Bagh is an English Medium, private co- educational secondary school institution affiliated with MPBSE, It was established in 2003 and now has classes from Nursery to Class XII. ==References== Category:Private schools in Madhya Pradesh Category:High schools and secondary schools in Madhya Pradesh Category:Dhar district Category:Educational institutions established in 2003 Category:2003 establishments in India
title: City Convent Higher Secondary School, Bagh
